pageTitle: Has your doctor, consultant or specialist nurse completed an SR1, DS1500 or BASRiS form?

ds1500Report.label: Has your doctor, consultant or specialist nurse completed an SR1, DS1500 or BASRiS form?
ds1500Report.hint: An SR1, DS1500 or BASRiS is a form that gives the Department for Work and Pensions evidence about your illness.

errors.required: Select yes if your doctor or specialist nurse has completed an SR1, DS1500 or BASRiS form
